roleset.name: like a fish on dry land
roleset.note: FLOUNDER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flounder' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Bungling. Bungle bungle bungle. I just like the word. (from flounder.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: not doing well at all
example.text: But five weeks after the premiere, the series has floundered.
